long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Watch TV extension replaces your new tab with online tv show streaming search & sponsored web search.

When you install Watch TV, this extension will configure your New Tab to Watch TV with Web Search, TV Show Streaming options, Current Time/Date, & Custom Web Shortcuts.

How Watch TV works.
Step 1: Search for any TV Show by clicking the menu icon at the top right.
Step 2: Our System will then find the best streaming options available.
Step 3: Click Watch Now on any service to stream show.


Permissions Request
-New Tab
This extension will replace the page you see when opening a new tab with Watch TV

Helpful Links
Privacy:     https://watchtvonline.org/pages/privacy.html
Uninstall:   https://watchtvonline.org/pages/uninstall.html
